document.full_text: with barcelona expected to approve a resolution addressing nakedness or improper dress in the street, the season for legal nudity in the spanish city may be drawing to a close.
document.title: barcelona journal: too much of a sweeping view nudges barcelona to shed a law
lines_and_colors: with barcelona expected to approve a resolution addressing nakedness or improper dress in the street, the season for legal nudity in the spanish city may be drawing to a close.
